Who is Metaphor

Metaphor is a Call of Duty Warzone streamer who has held the world record in solo kills on every single map. His playstyle can be described as aggressive and reckless, and he does not shy away from a fight.

While this playstyle often leads him to lose games, it makes for entertaining gameplay and often high kill games. As a streamer he prioritizes his chat and does everything he can to interact with his viewers at an impressive rate.

For more information about Metaphor, check out the FAQ site, and make sure to join the Discord server.
